caption: Jan van Vliet (born 1610, Delft, The Netherlands; active Leiden, The Netherlands and Antwerp, Belgium; died The Netherlands), after Rembrandt van Rijn (1606–1669; born Leiden, Netherlands; died Amsterdam, Netherlands), St. Jerome, 1631. Engraving; 36.2 x 28.8 cm (plate), 36.7 x 29.3 cm (sheet). Bequest of Junius S. Morgan, Class of 1888 (x1940-91)
